General.Name: Shandong Kehui Power Automation Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Kehui Power Automation Co.,Ltd. develops and sells cable and transmission line fault locators in China and internationally. It produces power cable fault test systems, transmission line fault monitoring, power distribution automation, railway power automation, and switched reluctance motors. Shandong Kehui Power Automation Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Zibo, China.
